meta.name: Abdullahi Adedayo Adekola
meta.title: Senior Software Engineer
meta.shortBio: I build scalable, high-availability systems for fintech and enterprise ‚Äî from Java microservices to React frontends. Based in Lagos, Nigeria.

paragraphs: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience designing and shipping production systems across fintech, banking, and SaaS platforms. My work spans the full stack ‚Äî Java Spring Boot microservices, Node.js APIs, React frontends, and cloud infrastructure on AWS.

At Paga, I led backend engineering for core payment systems ‚Äî building reconciliation modules, lien management systems, and an automated card reversal flow that eliminated manual intervention from a critical customer pain point.

At OnePipe, I optimised financial transaction limits, integrated NIBSS Direct Debit across partner banks, and implemented event-driven architectures using RabbitMQ that handled thousands of daily transactions reliably.
I care deeply about code quality, developer experience, and building systems that don't just work ‚Äî but are maintainable and observable over time.

experience.blurb: Mobile payment ecosystem for digital money transfers across Africa
bullets: Architected and delivered a Lien Management System for account-level financial controls and regulatory compliance.
Designed a reconciliation module bridging the order service and financial module with real-time payment flow insights.
Implemented an automated card-funding reversal system, eliminating manual CX intervention on failed transactions.
Built automated withdrawal routing logic that dynamically selects the appropriate processor by amount.
Delivered bulk transaction export (CSV & Excel) for back-office financial analysis and audit workflows.
Championed an in-house documentation generation tool for the legacy codebase to improve onboarding speed.

experience.blurb: Unified API layer enabling Nigerian financial institutions to access banking services
bullets: Optimised the limit management system for financial transactions, improving processing efficiency by 40%.
Designed and built NIBSS Direct Debit integration, supporting thousands of recurring debit mandates daily.
Implemented eMandate creation, activation, and retry workflows using event-driven architecture with RabbitMQ.
Built a full-stack KPI dashboard for educational clients ‚Äî Spring Boot backend + React frontend.

experience.blurb: Edtech platform for student registration and administrative operations
bullets: Built a cloud-native student registration portal on AWS (S3, SES, DynamoDB) with MongoDB as the primary datastore.
Improved application response times through database query optimisation and efficient backend coding practices.
Collaborated with the R&D team on emerging technology evaluation and strategic adoption decisions.
